code: import React,{useRef,useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./reservationRequest.css';function ReservationRequest(){var nameRef=useRef('');var emailRef=useRef('');var phoneRef=useRef('');var handleFormSubmit=function handleFormSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();console.log(nameRef.current.value);};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{id:"reservation-request"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h3",null,"Request a Reservation"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{onSubmit:handleFormSubmit},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Name",ref:nameRef}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"email",placeholder:"E-Mail",ref:emailRef}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"number",name:"phone",placeholder:"Phone Number",ref:phoneRef}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"submit"},"Submit Request")));}export default ReservationRequest;
